interactions_per_day.name: interactions_per_day
interactions_per_day.sql_query:
SELECT 
                        date as "Date",
                        COUNT(*) as "Total Interactions",
                        COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as "Unique Sessions",
                        AVG(interaction_id) as "Avg Interactions per Session"
                    FROM 's3://convo/tables/conversation_entry/**/*.parquet'
                    GROUP BY date 
                    ORDER BY date DESC

popular_actions.name: popular_actions
popular_actions.description: Most common action types in conversations
popular_actions.sql_query:
SELECT 
                        action as "Action Type",
                        COUNT(*) as "Count",
                        ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) as "Percentage"
                    FROM 's3://convo/tables/conversation_entry/**/*.parquet'
                    WHERE action IS NOT NULL
                    GROUP BY action 
                    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

active_sessions.name: active_sessions
active_sessions.description: Sessions with multiple interactions (more engaging conversations)
active_sessions.sql_query:
SELECT 
                        session_id as "Session ID",
                        COUNT(*) as "Total Interactions",
                        MIN(question_created) as "First Question",
                        MAX(answer_created) as "Last Answer",
                        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (MAX(answer_created) - MIN(question_created))) / 60 as "Duration (minutes)"
                    FROM 's3://convo/tables/conversation_entry/**/*.parquet'
                    GROUP BY session_id 
                    HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
                    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

recent_conversations.name: recent_conversations
recent_conversations.sql_query:
SELECT 
                        date as "Date",
                        session_id as "Session ID",
                        interaction_id as "Interaction",
                        LEFT(question, 50) || '...' as "Question Preview",
                        action as "Action Type",
                        user_id as "User ID",
                        location_id as "Store Location"
                    FROM 's3://convo/tables/conversation_entry/**/*.parquet'
                    WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL 7 DAY
                    ORDER BY question_created DESC

location_activity.name: location_activity
location_activity.sql_query:
SELECT 
                        location_id as "Store Location",
                        region_id as "Region",
                        group_id as "Group",
                        district_id as "District",
                        COUNT(*) as "Total Conversations",
                        COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as "Unique Sessions",
                        COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) as "Unique Users"
                    FROM 's3://convo/tables/conversation_entry/**/*.parquet'
                    WHERE location_id IS NOT NULL
                    GROUP BY location_id, region_id, group_id, district_id
                    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
